Definition: Given an app review, your task is to identify whether its sentiment is "Positive" or "Negative".

Positive Examples.input: Fantastic app! When I connect my BT headset  I have it set to read important notifications - add that to Google Now's                 ability to create texts  reminders and calendar events  and my $20 headset has all the functionality of a smartwatch.                     Kudos to the developer!
Positive Examples.explanation: There is an expression of happiness in this text. Hence, it is Positive

Negative Examples.explanation: There is an expression of sadness in this text but it is labeled as Positive. It should be Negative

Negative Examples.input: Great application Work's well with my ZenFone 5
